contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 26, 1947 D Tasmanian Band Championships (C Grade Brass)
Tasmanian Band Championships (C Grade Brass) 30 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Tasmanian Band Championships tasmanian-band-championships-c-grade-brass
Australia
C Grade
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Aurora Stadium, Launceston, Tasmania, Australia Programme confirms a C (5 Bands) & D Grade -Contest (6 Bands, 25th Dec) that Year. There was a Quickstep Part followed by a Waltz / Selection on this Contest.
Massed Band played: 'Old Comrades' (at Quickstep) and 'Hymn - Adeste Fideles' & 'March - Invercargill' (Waltz / Selection)
> The Tasmanian Band League was just est. in 1946 and here 1947 ist the First Year with a confirmed Programme - but no Details on Bands/Results so far. > J.A. Stanbrough: Adjudicator Drill > At that Time it was called 'Brass and Pipe Band Contest'
Oct. 2, 2015, 8:21 a.m. April 2, 2016, 1:09 p.m.
